Package jdkc_exchange

Class PersistenceManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • jdkc_exchange.PersistenceManager
  • public class PersistenceManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for persisting SiteManager data. The Persistence Manager class persists the data associated with a Site Manager object. It has two methods, read and save, which are the key players in persisting data. The save method accepts a Site Manager object and creates a save file. The read method accepts a save file and instantiates a Site Manager object from the file. The file formatting which is used by this class is located at https://github.com/vsu-se/team2_fall18/blob/master/docs/userrules.md
    See Also:
    SiteManager
